comments.content:
Hi Jason,

the headline is [Bernhard Schönschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823102637/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/bernhard-schoenschrift/familytree.html).

F
Thanks Florian, now we'll see if anyone can nail that text face.
The smaller text looks like [Granjon](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823102637/http:/www.linotype.com/13277/granjonroman-font.html) to me.

Not quite Olli, the italic "h" is the first flag, but the general "roundness" of the text face above doesn't quite work with Granjon. I'm thinking more Arts & Crafts era: some late 19th century revival of the early Renaissance types.
I knew that was too easy!
